name: sorcery-map
description: Find your way through the chain of sourcemaps to the original source, like magic
author: Emmanuel Kimmerlin

scripts.build: del-cli -f dist && rollup -m -c --format cjs -o dist/sorcery-map.cjs.js && rollup -m -c --format es -o dist/sorcery-map.es.js
scripts.test-coverage: del-cli -f coverage/* && istanbul cover --report json node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test/test.js
scripts.posttest-coverage: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.json -b dist && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.lcov -t lcovonly -b dist && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped -t html -b dist
